https://tmrev.io/movie/972426-BLUSH – An Extraordinary Voyage 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fBn4BEu5dPODnNDcyRJboIe4XzH.jpg For 18-year-old Finnish–Kosovan Fatu, a simple visit to the grocery store feels as nerve-racking as a lunar expedition: for the first time in his life, he’s wearing makeup in public. Luckily his best friend Rai, a young woman on the spectrum of autism, is there to ferociously support him through the voyage. BLUSH – An Extraordinary Voyage
